Topic.Title: PRIZE for solving HAWK THE HUNTER:  A 3D model of the MINDSWORD hilt!

Posts.EditableText:
*PRIZE FOR SOLVING THE GAME!* If you traverse HAWK THE HUNTER all the way to a victorious end, you may WIN a 3D model of the MINDSWORD hilt as a pencil topper! 

To be eligible, send me a Quest message or leave a Comment at: http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/w3octfve1u2_15hfq8dbyg/hawk-the-hunter. 

I will respond with my email address and more details, and after I receive your game transcript (the Quest file of your playthrough), I will send the first winner this grand conversation piece (for free, at my expense) to grace your desk.

Here's a photo of the (unpainted) MINDSWORD pencil topper:
https://www.facebook.com/photo?fbid=10223719285953471&set=pcb.10223719286553486
